title: Rengar.. time for a buff
body:
After a lot of thought going into this idea, I think that it's safe to say that my point is vaild, Rengar definitely needs a buff. Now most of you might be thinking no way he's already op (dont really see how anymore since hes gotten nerf after nerf) but im not asking to raise his damage. I think to make rengar more viable his emp w should have a base heal (15pct of hp + pct of dmg taken). Giving this to rengar would not push him over the top but would help him sustain in lane / jungle. I mainly play rengar top.

THOUGHTS?

replies.body:
My opinion is that if a champion needs to have 'nerf after nerf', it's probably because their kit is not exactly healthy, so I don't see how buffing him is going to make him healthier. 

Broken Scripts has a point, the 0.1 second one-hits are not easily forgotten, and **NO ONE** wants to return to anything anywhere close to resembling something that even remotely reminds us of that.

I can't speak for most players. but I personally don't see many Rengars atm, but when I do see them, they don't strike me as either too powerful or too weak.

And if anything was to be buffed on Rengo I don't think it should be his survivability. The whole point of assassins is that you jump in, take out the target, and then are expendable.

Having a champ that can jump in, 1-hit someone and then lifesteal/heal/shield their way out, is not a step forward, _(looking at you Trynd/Lee/Yas)_.
I think he's fine. I still get flashbacks from getting 1 hit by Rengar at level 6.
